topic.title: Test ph
topic.shortdesc: This should test attributes on ph and ph-based tags, plus term because there's only one.

body.p: Test a basic ph.
Test a basic ph with keyref.
Test a basic ph with outputclass.
Test a basic ph with everything.
Test a basic b.
Test a basic b with everything.
Test a basic codeph.
Test a basic codeph with outputclass.
Test a basic codeph with everything.
Test a basic filepath.
Test a basic filepath with outputclass.
Test a basic filepath with everything.
Test a basic i.
Test a basic i with everything.
Test a basic msgph.
Test a basic msgph.
Test a basic msgph with everything.
Test a basic sub.
Test a basic sub with outputclass.
Test a basic sub with everything.
Test a basic sup.
Test a basic sup with outputclass.
Test a basic sup with everything.
Test a basic synph.
Test a basic synph with outputclass.
Test a basic synph with everything.
Test a basic systemoutput.
Test a basic systemoutput with outputclass.
Test a basic systemoutput with everything.
Test a basic tt.
Test a basic tt with everything.
Test a basic u.
Test a basic u with everything.
Test a basic uicontrol.
Test a basic uicontrol with outputclass.
Test a basic uicontrol with keyref.
Test a basic uicontrol with everything.
Test a basic userinput.
Test a basic userinput with outputclass.
Test a basic userinput with everything.
That seems to be all of our ph domain specializations. Now I will test term:
Test a basic term.
Test a basic term with outputclass.
Test a basic term with keyref.
Test a basic term with everything.

topic.title: Everything in a phrase
topic.shortdesc: This should test putting everything I can into a phrase.

body.p: Test a phrase: PCDATA, followed by basic.ph and txt.incl: test apiname test bold (test boolean ->) test cmdname test codeph test filepath test italic test indexterm in phrase test keyword test menucascade/uicontrol test msgnum test msgph test option test parmname test ph testing a quote (test state => ) test sub test sup test synph test systemoutput test term test tt test underlined test uicontrol test uicontrol/shortcut test userinput test varname this is a draft commentthis is required cleanupThis is a footnote, which is part of txt.incltxt.incl index term test wintitle test cite test xref test tm. That was my phrase.
